title: Wrongly banned
text: I‚Äôve been using snapchat for YEARS. It was my most used app, i‚Äôve recommend this app to hundreds of people including recommending people for snapchat+ gaining the company profits. I, However made a fatal decision to help a stranger out by logging into his account to delete chats before his mom saw them. keep in mind i had 0 context what they were, wasn‚Äôt intending to look either. again however, once i typed in the email and password i got a pop up saying his account was banned. I texted him, ‚Äúlooks like your account got banned‚Äù?  Not sure. Though, once i had logged back into MY account it gave me the error code SS06, indicating that i had been device banned. This was MONTHS ago. i understood that i made a dumb decision helping a almost total  stranger with his account drama and got a ban in result. i accepted this, figuring snapchat would come to help me atleast with a final decision. instead of a message leading on users ‚ÄúYour account has been TEMPORARILY‚Äù suspended. Complete lying to their user base. Snapchat has been getting lots of hate via social media, and many of my friends have since deleted the app. the support team is a laughing stock compared to any support group on the planet. Completely mockery of business and keeping the flow of a BILLION dollar industry. your support group is making your company lose users, which is many you lose money. which makes your company stupid. smh. Good luck with anyone trying to use snapchat support. you could be sitting face to face with their employees and they‚Äôd have an aneurysm trying to figure out how to open their lips and try to give you an answer. Don‚Äôt download this app. It‚Äôs completely addictive, and it‚Äôs terrible for mental health. Stay away sincerely.

title: AI
text:
Ever since Snapchat decided to roll out their AI feature, the apps been terrible. Not being able to unpin it from the top of my friends list is annoying, especially when it doesn‚Äôt ever load right away. I‚Äôm tired of accidentally sending a snap to this stupid feature when it‚Äôs meant to go to someone else. 

Half the time I‚Äôm having a conversation with someone and the AI pops up right as I‚Äôm trying to reply so my message goes to the AI instead. Get rid of this feature, or at the very least let people unpin the conversation. Stop trying to collect data from your users to make money!
